physical_appearance:This clipping is an article from the periodical \u0027The Orient Illustrated Weekly\u0027 published on 30 June 1946. An excerpt of the article is printed on the center of the publication. The article includes three black-and-white photographs. There is a small tear at the top-center of the clipping.
